Description:
Developer? Renovator? 1st Home Buyer?
If you have been looking for a property with outstanding development potential, then stop, look no further, you've found it! Situated on the fringe of St. Albans Park, this is an Ideal opportunity to secure a corner allotment of approx. 1007m2, in a great little pocket with outstanding potential. Add your own special touch to the current weather board home of good size which features 3 Br's, spacious lounge, functional kitchen & separate meals area. There is also a study area as well, which is an added bonus. Once outdoors there is plenty of yard space which is complimented by a large shed, ideal for those who would like to run a business from home, or for the mechanic who likes working on cars, or for those who simply want a large shed for storage. The opportunities are simply endless. The decision can then be made whether to renovate, sub-divide or totally re-develop. With the possibility of 4 townhouses to be erected (STCA) this property is sure to be in high demand. Close to all facilities, amenities, major shopping centers, all forms of education, sporting grounds & less than 5 mins from Geelong's CBD. Terms are 10% deposit and balance in 60 days or earlier by mutual agreement.
Insights: 2 Dew Street, WHITTINGTON VIC 3219 was last sold in 2010 and 30 other 3 bedroom house in WHITTINGTON have recently been sold.

Description:
First Home, Investment or Downsizer
Great value here with this terrific 2 bedroom unit in a handy location close to schools, public transport and major shopping centres. Front unit of only 2 on the block, no body corporate fees, handy buffer between the units so it really feels like your own property. Consists of lounge, dining, kitchen, bathroom, laundry, single brick garage and large L-shaped courtyard.

Description:
Practically New residence with huge family spaces!
$290,000 - $320,000
Built in a new cul de sac amongst quality housing and just walking distance to Newcomb shopping centre and all conveniences. Outstanding family home with design and space at the forefront of design. 4 large bedrooms complete with robes, master with extra size wir's and full ensuite. Open plan family room provides meals area and adjoins spacious kitchen with plenty bench space and excellent cookware. Formal lounge provides privacy or extra living space, second family bathroom and oversize double remote garage. Extras include ducted heating/cooling, extra cupboards, quality fitout, positioned on a 730sqm metre allotment. Well below replacement cost!

Description:
The Perfect Start, But Don't Wait!!
If you have been looking to enter the property market or wanting to start or add to your investment port folio, this property is a must for your list. Take advantage of the $17,000 Governments First Home Owners Grant and secure this well maintained property. For the astute investor, a perfect opportunity to either start or add to your investment port folio, with good strong rental demands in this area. This well maintained Brick Veneer property certainly has a lot to offer. Features 3 generous sized Bedrooms, with BIR's in bedrooms 1 & 2, spacious Lounge with gas heating, fully appointed functional Kitchen including a Dishwasher, separate Meals area and a second living area which has glass sliding doors leading to outdoor entertaining area which is very private and easy to maintain. The Bathroom & Laundry are both of good size and there are plenty of storage cupboards. The generous sized rear yard is complemented by a bird aviary and a garden shed, but still leaving plenty of room for the children to amuse themselves. Car accommodation is taken care of with a single lock up garage and the advantage of an additional car space in front. Close to facilities, amenities, all forms of education, shopping centers and public transport at your doorstep. All this on an approx. 600m2 allotment, means that you must act quickly to be the lucky purchaser. Call now and book in your inspection!

Description:
Simply, Move In and Enjoy
If you have been looking for that perfect entry into the property market or are considering to start or add to your "Investment Portfolio, then STOP! Look no further, you've found it! Take advantage of the Governments $17,000 "First Home Owners" Grant (which ends June 30th) and take the time to inspect this little gem. Situated on the fringe of St. Albans Park, this property is sure to attract the attention of the astute purchaser. Behind the private front fence, you will certainly be surprised by what's inside. Featuring 3 very spacious BR's,(all with BIR's), separate study area, 2 x living areas, both with Air Conditioning units and a separate meals room. The fully appointed renovated kitchen comes complete with dishwasher & the island bench and double door pantry provide plenty of space and room to move. The central bathroom has been totally transformed, and is complemented by double vanities & a large corner spa, so you can relax in style and comfort after a hard days work. The second living room has built in cupboards and glass sliding doors which leads you to the fantastic outdoor entertaining area, where the Timber decked, fully enclosed pergola area awaits. Additional entertaining areas are provided by the addition of a Wind sail, plus there is also a brick paved area, ideal for further tables and chairs, making this home the perfect entertainer! Car accommodation is taken care of, with a Double Carport, + a SLUG which is complemented by an attached workshop. The fully established front & rear gardens are very tastefully done and are of very low maintenance. Additional features include, split systems in living areas, ducted heating, garden shed and there is even a "Cubby House," will surely be a favorite with the little ones! Close to all amenities & facilities, public transport, sporting grounds, 2 x major shopping centre's and Pre-school, Primary and Secondary Education facilities are all within walking distance. The list goes on and on. This property is a must see inspection and will surely impress. But "BE QUICK" or else you will miss out!!
Insights: 45 Chapel Street, WHITTINGTON VIC 3219 was last sold in 2009 and 30 other 3 bedroom house in WHITTINGTON have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Start or Outstanding Investment
Superbly nestled in a lovely quiet cul de sac and located close to all facilities. This fabulous 2 bedroom unit is more like a small house. Comprises large sun lit open plan living, bright functional kitchen, both bedrooms with built in robes, full bathroom, separate toilet and separate laundry. On the outside a sun drenched north facing rear yard, private bbq area and plenty of room to enjoy the outdoors or for pup to run around in. Enclosed carport with roller door and store room completes this exceptional home. Also presents as an outstanding investment opportunity with an excellent long term tenant in place who wishes to stay on. Either way this is a golden opportunity not to be missed. Inspect now.

Description:
What A Beauty!
Completely transformed with no expense spared! This single bedroom unit with a great functional layout has been totally refurbished with neutral tones throughout. Featuring an impressive new kitchen with ceramic cook top and stainless steel oven. Porcelain tiles to all wet areas and a stylish and spacious bathroom, elegant lounge and warm and cosy bedroom. In addition, there is a carport and your own private courtyard which provides a perfect spot to entertain with family and friends, or simply chill out and relax when you need some time alone. Did we mention the location it is perfectly positioned within walking distance of two major shopping centres and in close proximity to public transport and the CBD. This unit encourages a relaxing and comfortable lifestyle both indoors and out. This is a fantastic opportunity to enter the residential market, demonstrating great value for money! Don’t hesitate to inspect as we are certain it will impress the most discerning buyer.

Description:
Get excited your search ends here
Come home to this corner of tranquility every day, overlooking the scenic Barwon River this superb three bedroom unit is perfect in many ways. When you come to see this home you will be surprised at how roomy and spacious it is, appropriate for starting out, suitable as an investment or for when you plan to move out of the family home and want something with enough space to enjoy living.
You will dream the days away within this large naturally lit extra large living area with bamboo floors, neutral tones and clever design features that maximise harmony.
Your very favourite dish will easily be prepared in this designer kitchen with wide 900mm oven, ceaser stone bench tops, feature lighting, large pantry and pull out drawers.
Primary bedroom with perfectly fitted hanging and shelving within the walk in wardrobe and full ensuite bathroom, there are two further carpeted bedrooms that both have built in wardrobes serviced by a central bathroom.
features include ducted heating, split system cooling, double glazed windows, private courtyard, low maintenance garden, extra large double garage with remote entry and door into the house through the laundry, solar boosted hot water service. extra extra storage cupboards in the hallway and laundry. Bus Stop on the street right out the front.
This is a great location near the beautiful Barwon River, only 7 minutes from Eastern Beach and 20-30 minutes to places like Queenscliff, Ocean Grove, Barwon Heads and Torquay - and a lovely, practical and liveable home as well :)"
Inspections by appointment - please observe all government regulations. hand sanitiser available or bring your own :)
Insights: 4/58 Tucker Street, Breakwater VIC 3219 was last sold in 2017 and 1 other 3 bedroom unit in Breakwater have recently been sold.

Description:
Renovated gem in Growth suburb!
This stunning renovated double fronted weather-board home situated behind private secure high fences is yours for the taking! Located in the fast-growing suburb of Newcomb on the fringe of East Geelong with views from the kitchen and outdoor entertaining of the you-yangs and the bay - it really doesn't get much better than this.
Suited to first home buyers or investors is this fantastic offering with a modern living lifestyle that is often searched for and ready move straight into and enjoy. Step inside and be greeted by the extra high ceilings, a light, bright and airy home. You will surely be impressed
Features include:
Low maintenance 413sqm allotment
Master with quality Ensuite - semi framless shower with double shower heads and double vanity
2 additionals bedrooms
Study nook
Open plan kitchen/dining/outdoor alfresco area with breakfast bar and amazing views
Extra large living and dining area
Central bathroom with shower, bath and toilet
European style laundry
Secure off-street carport
Expected weekly rental of approx. $320 - $340pw
Located 5 minutes from the Geelong CBD and 20 minutes to the best wineries on the Bellarine you can see why the secret of Newcomb is slowly getting out. Walking distance to local primary school, shopping centres, services & transport. This will be a great buy for years to come we cant wait to show you your new home - Inspect today this won't last long!

Description:
Immaculate Inside & Out!!
Located on a brilliant block of approx. 655sqm is this very neat & tidy BV home ideal for first home buyers & investors alike. Featuring 3 bedrooms, a spacious light-filled front lounge, large kitchen & meals area. There is an undercover area off the back of the house which could be used as an entertainment area or second under cover car space. A SLUG with large workshop, plenty of additional off street parking & secure rear yard complete this fantastic package. Located only minutes from Bellarine Village & only a short drive into central Geelong & with plenty of schools in the immediate area this property is not to be missed. The Newcomb area continues to achieve outstanding results so here is your chance to secure an amazing property and watch it grow. Approx rent of $320 - $350pw.

Description:
A great place to start
Whether you are looking to enter the market, invest or downsize then this property is sure to impress. This centrally positioned townhouse is within easy reach of the Bellarine Village shopping centre, medical facilities, The Gordon East Geelong campus, Geelong CBD and public transport, quite simply you will love this central location and an inspection of this property won't disappoint. This property has been lovingly and tastefully renovated throughout. Offering a light filled living and dining area, complete with new carpet and window treatments, while the kitchen has undergone a full transformation with new kitchen cabinets, large built in pantry, electric under bench oven, gas cooktop, dishwasher and new tiling throughout. There are two bedrooms, the master has a walk-in robe, convenient access to the two-way bathroom and separate W.C. While the second bedroom is generous in size with built in robes. The laundry has again been transformed and now houses an abundance of storage and bench space. Outdoors, there is a covered alfresco area, surrounded by a lush fernery, fully fenced front and back gardens and a single lock up garage and garden shed. With gas wall furnace, split system reverse cycle unit and security system, there is nothing left to do but move in, relax and enjoy.

Description:
Pure Elegance in Leafy East
Your every need has been considered and delivered with quality, elegance and thoughtful attention to detail in this stunning character home superbly located in one of the most charming and picturesque pockets of Geelong.
At first sight, this stunning home welcomes you with its graceful charm, the classic Californian bungalow façade is presented in a classic colour palette, complemented perfectly by beautiful cottage gardens.
On entry, the spectacular floorplan takes your eye down the full length of the home instantly revealing the impressive scale of the ceiling heights and lush backdrop of the outdoors. The original polished floorboards blend seamlessly into the Tasmanian Oak in the extension and the clean lines of the renovation merge perfectly with the preserved character elements that pay homage to its original features.
The sophisticated hub of the home consists of an open plan kitchen, living and dining area which provides the perfect layout for everyday living or an impressive setting for entertaining. A series of bi-fold doors opens up to the rear al-fresco area, creating an expansive indoor/outdoor space framed by lush hedges, ample yard with a family friendly 666sqm approx block and gorgeous garden beds.
The features of this home are endless with the high-end kitchen including 60mm Caesarstone benchtops, Siemens pyrolytic ovens and induction cooktop, Bosch dishwasher, generous butlers pantry with sink and filter tap, Schweigen Rangehood and twin Velux skylights which become a feature in themselves, bathing the room in natural light.
Four bedrooms are generous in proportion, the master includes large walk through robe and luxury ensuite. All remaining bedrooms include built in robes and are serviced by a beautifully finished central bathroom. A second living area completes the family friendly design, providing the perfect space to escape and relax in peace.
While the aesthetics of this home will no doubt impress, behind the scenes much consideration has been given to ensuring energy efficiency with hydronic heating throughout , high-efficiency instantaneous gas HWS with temperature control, dual direction ceiling fans, ducted evaporative air conditioning, wood burning fireplace, double glazed windows, 3000 litre water tank, high-grade insulation and a 4.6kw solar panel system with internet monitoring. CCTV security, electric gates and lockup carport complete the impressive package, providing secure and convenient access.
The location of this property is second to none with Garden Street shopping and café precinct, Eastern Gardens, Eastern Beach Waterfront, CBD and South Geelong Station all within a 2km (approx.) radius of your front door.
Offering a lifestyle that encompasses luxurious living with all the spoils of proximity to some of our citys most stunning locations, parks, restaurants and cafes, this property presents a unique opportunity to secure a picture-perfect future for your family. Dont let this one pass you by.
Terms: 10% Deposit, 60 day Settlement. For alternative arrangements, please discuss with agent.
Insights: First listed on 21 September, this house has been on Domain for 30 days (last updated on 1 September). It was last sold in 2020 and 15 other 4 bedroom house in East Geelong have recently been sold.

Description:
PERFECT FIRST HOME, DOWNSIZER OR INVESTORS DREAM PROPERTY
Calling all first home buyers, downsizers and investors! This recently renovated, smartly presented 2 bed, 1 bath, 1 living, single carport unit is one of 6 set in a convenient location only several minutes' drive to Geelong's CBD. Upon entry you are greeted with beautiful modern, light filled open plan living featuring new laminated wood style flooring and freshly painted walls. The meals area seating up to 6 includes a ceiling fan and Braemar wall heater and for year-round comfort. The newly updated, modern kitchen is spacious with Artusi electric Oven and Cook top, , ceiling fan & plenty of space provided by the stylish new benchtops and cupboards.
Down the hall you have 2 great sized bedrooms both with BIR and Ceiling fans. The bathroom is bright and modern with new corner shower, vanity, sky light, Led downlights and toilet. The laundry is a large functional space leading out to the lovely spacious private courtyard where you can entertain all year round. This property is very low maintenance and is close to schools, public transport and shopping centers.
• Private courtyard
• $290 rent per week
• Low body corp fees
• Recently renovated
• 5km to Geelong CBD and waterfront

Description:
Stylish and Updated
Perfectly positioned close to schools, shops and transport, this charming weatherboard home would be ideal for first home buyers, empty nesters or investors seeking a gorgeous home with nothing to do. Modern living sets the theme throughout the updated home, providing cleverly zoned living with plenty of space for everyone to enjoy! With a perfect layout for family living and entertaining alike, three bedrooms, serviced by the family bathroom, master with ensuite. The brightly lit and spacious lounge leads through to the meals area and well-equipped kitchen with dishwasher and stainless-steel appliances overlooking the yard. With timber floorboards, freshly painted inside and out and air con, youll be comfortable all year round. Outside is a North facing decked entertaining area, carport with drive through access perfect for storing the trailer and extra off-street parking. This immaculately presented and superbly located home within walking distance to Newcomb Shopping Village is definitely a crowd pleaser!
Insights: 1/28 Brayshay Road, Newcomb VIC 3219 was last sold in 2020 and 61 other 3 bedroom house in Newcomb have recently been sold.
